document.full_text: a second pivotal trial of ruxolitinib, developed by incyte corp and novartis, met its goal of showing that the drug significantly reduces spleen size in myelofibrosis patients.
document.title: incyte, novartis myelofibrosis trial meets goal
lines_and_colors: a second pivotal trial of ruxolitinib, developed by incyte corp and novartis, met its goal of showing that the drug significantly reduces spleen size in myelofibrosis patients.
